item.description:
In case you didn't get the email today here is what it said:

Hello to all! Looking forward to seeing you on Monday! I will be coming home from Temple Sinai in Brookline after services so probably will be there around 6:45. But, my son Erik will be there and those of you who would like to come earlier to help set up the food that would be great! I will post the directions to my house below!

We will provide lox, bagels, cream cheese, and paper goods. Some of you have already volunteered to bring things and so that will be listed below. If not, I would like to assign you an item to bring, or if there is something else you would prefer to make, please let me know as soon as possible! thanks! Ellen


Lox, bagels, Cream Cheese, paper goods (Jewish Singles Meetup-Ellen)

Coffee/Cream-June

Tuna Salad-Julie

Egg Salad-Dale

Tossed Salad-Robin

Slices Tomatoes/Red Onion-Laura M.

Blintz Souffle-Ellen

Miami Lox Spread-Rosalie

Herring/Sour cream-Ellen A.

Vegetable Sushi-Palma

Hummus-Elie

Pita bread/crackers-Gayle

Fruit Plate-Michael and guest

Challah-Susan

Pastry-Bev

Dessert-Debra Anne

Dessert-Mark Lewis

Wine-Marc Revzin

Orange juice-2 half gallon - Harvey

Soda (2 diet/2 seltzer)-David G.

Directions to Ellen's-63 Vincent Road, Dedham, MA phone-781-326-3567

Take 128/95 to East Street exit-go around rotary and bear right at the East St. towards Dedham exit . At the first light turn right on to Vincent road. My house is two blocks down on the right at the corner of Vincent and Chester. Please make a right on Chester Road-and park there. I do have two driveways so two cars can park there but leave a space for me!
item.name: Break The Fast at Ellen's New Home!
